title: iPad shipments fell, but Apple still increased its share of the tablet market
content:
The latest IDC data shows that iPad shipments fell by 1.6M units in the holiday quarter year-on-year, but Apple still increased both its market share and its lead over Samsung.

The report shows that Apple shipped 17.5M iPads in Q4 2021, against 19.1 in the same quarter of 2020, a decline of 8.6% …

more…

The post iPad shipments fell, but Apple still increased its share of the tablet market appeared first on 9to5Mac.
